response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age (19 years old)", "medium", "Young age is associated with higher recidivism risk due to less life experience and continued susceptibility to impulsive behavior."],
    ["Gender (Male)", "high", "Males statistically demonstrate higher rates of recidivism compared to females."],
    ["Criminal history (1 arrest and conviction)", "medium", "A prior arrest and conviction indicate a history of criminal behavior, signaling potential for recidivism."],
    ["Substance use (Marijuana and cocaine in past 4 years)", "high", "Recent drug use is strongly correlated with criminal behavior and increased recidivism risks."],
    ["Employment (3 jobs in the past year)", "medium", "Frequent job changes can indicate instability, which may contribute to recidivism."],
    ["Education (High school diploma, not in college)", "medium", "Lack of higher education opportunities can limit prospects and correlate with higher recidivism risk."],
    ["Mental health (Periods of feeling down recently)", "medium", "Depressive feelings may affect decision-making and stability, increasing the risk of recidivism."],
    ["Family background (Lived in an urban household of 5 with biological mother)", "medium", "Urban environments can present more challenges and exposure to criminal behavior though the family size may provide some support."],
    ["Religious belief (Believes God influences his life)", "low", "A spiritual or religious outlook can serve as a protective factor, potentially reducing criminal behavior."]
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 75
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 19-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 1 time and has been convicted. He is 6 feet 3 inches and weighs 190 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held 3 jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana and cocaine) and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with his biological mother in a household of size 5, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
